name: the substitute
description:
fullscreen mode recommended!

group projects suck. especially when you're just trying to do your best, but your partner won't stop slacking off on their part of the project. everyone knows this. substitute teachers know this.

but for some reason, this school you're subbing at keeps leaving the decision for who gets partnered to who up to you.

code & sound by me

art & ideas by kev <3
